BatchDestinationAddressCondition as boolean, BatchOrigDest as boolean, BatchPNR as boolean, BatchResidence as boolean, BatchSubmission as boolean, BatchTriggerHours as short, BatchValidation as boolean, CheckinClearance as boolean, CheckinDOB as boolean, CheckinDestinationAddress as boolean, CheckinDestinationAddressCondition as boolean, CheckinGender as boolean, CheckinNationality as boolean, CheckinOrigDest as boolean, CheckinPNR as boolean, CheckinResidence as boolean, CheckinTravelDoc as boolean, CommonAccessReference as string, CountryEntity as string, FlightAdd as boolean, ExtractPassengerSecurityRulesColumns derive(ETL_CAPT_DT = currentDate('UTC'),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddAdditionalColumns
ExtractHealthCheckRuleColumns derive(ETL_CAPT_DT = currentDate('UTC'),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddAdditionalColumns2
ExtractCrewMemberSecurityRules derive(ETL_CAPT_DT = currentDate('UTC'),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddAdditionalColumns3
ExtractCarrierAddress derive(ETL_CAPT_DT = currentDate('UTC'),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddAdditionalColumns4
ExtractCarrierColumns derive(ETL_CAPT_DT = currentDate('UTC'),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddAdditionalColumns5
ConvertSegmentNoToInt derive(ETL_CAPT_DT = currentDate('UTC'),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddAdditionalColumns6
ExtractFlightColumns derive(SEG_NO = iif(SEG_NO==true(),1 ,0 )) ~> ConvertSegmentNoToInt
AddAdditionalColumns6 sink(input(

		ANCLRY_TMPLT_ID as string,
		ARRVL_GT as string,
		ARRVL_TRMNL as string,

		CREW_FLT_POST_DPTR_CLS_OUT_STS as string,
		CREW_FLT_PRE_DPTR_CLS_OUT_STS as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		DPTR_GT as string,
		DPTR_TRMNL as string,
		DEST_AIRPORT_CITY as string,
		DEST_AIRPORT_CNTRY_CD as string,
		DEST_AIRPORT_NAME as string,
		DEST_IATA as string,
		DEST_ICAO as string,
		ENABL_BRDNG as boolean,
		ENABL_CREW_APIS as boolean,
		ENABL_DCS as boolean,
		ENABL_PSNGR_APIS as boolean,
		ENABL_THRU_CHK_IN as boolean,
		ESTD_ARRVL_TIME as string,
		ESTD_DPTR_TIME as string,
		EXTRNL_ID as integer,
		FLT_DLAY as string,
		FLT_NO as integer,
		HAS_PSNGR_SCRTY_TRNS as boolean,
		HLTH_CHK_RULES_ID as string,
		PSNGRS as string,

		FLT_ID as string,
		IS_CNCLD as boolean,
		IS_OPEN_STNG as boolean,
		IS_PRGRSV_FLT as boolean,
		MKTG_CARR_CD as string,
		MSG as string,
		ORIG_AIRPORT_CITY as string,
		ORIG_AIRPORT_CNTRY_CD as string,
		ORIG_AIRPORT_NAME as string,
		ORIG_IATA as string,
		ORIG_ICAO as string,
		PSNGR_APP_RCPNT_ID as string,
		PAX_FLT_POST_DPTR_CLS_OUT_STS as string,
		PAX_FLT_PRE_DPTR_CLS_OUT_STS as string,

		SEG_NO as integer,
		STS as string,
		TAIL_NO as string,
		TOT_CRGO_LOAD as boolean,
		TOT_FUEL_LOAD as boolean,
		TYPE as string,
		UPLIFT_FUEL_LOAD as boolean,
		USE_AVG_BAG_WGT as boolean,
		USE_AVG_PAX_WGT as boolean,
		WGT_UNITS_KG as boolean,
		CREW_APP_RCPNT_ID as string,
		ETL_CAPT_DT as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string

	deletable:false,

	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,

	mapColumn(

	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NullReject, NullAcpt)
ConditionalSplit2@ActlArrvlAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(actual_arrival_airport == IATA,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportExists
ConditionalSplit2@ActlArrvlAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(actual_arrival_airport == IATA,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportDoesntExists1
IATAAirportDoesntExists1, BdavisAirport exists(toString(actual_arrival_airport)  == ICAO,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportExists
IATAAirportExists, ICAOAirportExists union(byName: true)~> ExsistUnion
IATAAirportDoesntExists1, BdavisAirport exists(actual_arrival_airport == ICAO,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportdoesntExists
AddRejectReason2, UnionOOOIRejection union(byName: true)~> RejectUnion1
ConditionalSplit1@NullReject derive(Reject_Reason = "Null Error") ~> NullRejectReason
ICAOAirportdoesntExists derive(Reject_Reason = "Invalid ACTL_ARRVL Airport Name") ~> AddRejectReason2
ConditionalSplit6@EstSchdAcpt split(isNull(actual_arrival_airport),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit2@(ActlArrvlAirportNull, ActlArrvlAirportNotNull)
ExsistUnion, ConditionalSplit2@ActlArrvlAirportNull union(byName: true)~> FilterUnion1
FilterUnion1 split(isNull(actual_departure_airport),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit3@(ActlDptrAirportNull, ActlDptrAirportNotNull)

	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportDoesntExists2

	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportExists2
IATAAirportDoesntExists2, BdavisAirport exists(actual_departure_airport == ICAO,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ICAOAirportdoesntExists2
ICAOAirportdoesntExists2 derive(Reject_Reason = "Actl Dptr Airport Name not found") ~> AddRejectReason3
RejectUnion1, AddRejectReason3 union(byName: true)~> RejectUnion2
ExistUnion2, ConditionalSplit3@ActlDptrAirportNull union(byName: true)~> FilterUnion2
FilterUnion2 split(isNull(base_airport),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit4@(BaseAirportNull, BaseAirportNotNull)
ConditionalSplit4@BaseAirportNotNull, BdavisAirport exists(base_airport == IATA,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IATAAirportExists3
